Title: Life-Size
Writer: Mark Rosman (teleplay), Stephanie Moore (teleplay), Stephanie Moore (story)
Actors: Lindsay Lohan, Jere Burns, Anne Marie DeLuise, Garwin Sanford
Plot: After the death of her mother, 14-year-old Casey is despondent. As she and her father Ben begin to drift apart, Casey finds a book of magic spells and tries to use one to bring her mother back to life. But the plan backfires, and instead she finds that she's animated Eve, a fashion-plate dress-up doll. Eve is excited to be both alive and nearly six feet tall, but she has a lot to learn about living in the real world - and Casey isn't so sure she has the desire or the patience to teach her.
